item.title: Projector Optics Internals
item.description:
Projector and optics personally is very facinating like astrology to me. Playing with light, was never fun and understanding when i was in school, but now I just love it, and also understanding how things work at the same time.

Here Matt beautifully shows internals of optics in projector.
